questions.question: Considering the overall form and style, what single-word best describes this footwear's type?

What is the color of the visible sole or heel base of the footwear, as visibly seen?
What is the main design feature across the vamp of the shoe, immediately observable?
Judging by the visual appearance, what is the overall style impression of this shoe?
Describe the visible texture of the upper material, focusing on tactile appearance.
What is the apparent construction method evident at the visible seams of the footwear?
What is the shade of the blue used on the upper part of the shoe, as visually perceived?
Observing the heel counter structure, what is its basic shape?
What design element is present at the intersection of the vamp and the strap, easily visible?
Examining the shoe's profile, what is the most noticeable aspect of its silhouette?
Describe the visible finish or shine on the shoe's main surface, as it appears to the eye.
Considering the sole's build, describe its general thickness as directly seen.
